_header: In my beginning God me speed
Note: See 709 for a couplet version of lines 1-2.
_description: Fragment (first 8 lines) of a poem urging readers to live a virtuous life — couplets

TCD490.First Lines:
In my be genynyg God me spedeIn grace & vertu to
                    prosede…
TCD490.Last Lines:
…ffor ssant paule sayht let not ssyne RayneIn yowre mortale
                    body est ye ssolde…
TCD490.Editions:
Scattergood,  V. John. 
             “Two Unrecorded Poems from Trinity College Dublin 490.” 
             Review of English Studies
         n.s. 38 (1987): 48-9: 48.
